alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 3:43PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LIGHT SNOW BRINGING PATCHY WINTER IMPACTS TUESDAY NIGHT... Northerly winds will be increasing late Tuesday afternoon and evening across the Devils Lake Basin and far northern Red River Valley. There will also be some light snow falling. While amounts are expected to be pretty light and remain under an inch, there could be some visibility problems due to falling and blowing snow Tuesday night. Gusty winds will linger after snow ends late Tuesday night, with some problems to high profile vehicles. Winds will begin to diminish by Wednesday.
